amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 115-3 to make technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Conaway.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
